There were no other sightings in Sugar Grove on or around January 19th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi got up early to get a drink of water and looked out the kitchen window. about 3\4 of a mile east of me, over a nearby subdivision, i saw what i thought at first was a plane going to the nearby aurora airport heading west. it had slow blinking lights. it seemed large and flying very low. it then stopped and hovered for about 10 minutes, i am not sure exactly, it was a long time. i took a picture and then went back to bed. it was still there when i looked out my bathroom window. it just kept on hovering over these homes. unfortunately, my camera could not get a clearer view (of course). i am writing in hopes someone else saw it, as it was there for so long.
